original_text: According to the number of years after the jubile thou shalt buy of thy neighbour, and according unto the number of years of the fruits he shall sell unto thee:
korean_text: 그 희년 후의 연수를 따라서 너는 이웃에게서 살 것이요 그도 소출을 얻을 연수를 따라서 네게 팔 것인즉

sentences.original_text: According to the number of years after the jubile
thou shalt buy of thy neighbour,
and according unto the number of years of the fruits
